DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the feasibility of combined administration of different LBH589 dosages with radiotherapy in order to establish the dosage to be evaluated in future studies.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Study of LBH589 (Panobinostat) in Combination With External Beam Radiotherapy for the Treatment of Prostate Cancer, Esophageal Cancer and Head and Neck Cancer
